Welcome to VAN TRAVEL – your hub for hitting the open road in comfort and style. Whether you’re a seasoned nomad or just dreaming of freedom on four wheels, we’ve got the tips, routes, gear reviews, and community stories to make every mile unforgettable. Pack your curiosity, fire up the engine, and let’s explore the world together, one highway at a time!

About us

Newes Stories

Amalfi Coast Escape

From Naples to Positano, we parked on cliffside vistas, cooked fresh pasta in our tiny kitchen, and savored sunrise aperitivos over glittering Mediterranean waters.

More

Alentejo Hideaway

Drifting through Portugal’s Alentejo, we tucked into ancient white villages, harvested olives, picnicked by a tranquil river, and fell asleep beneath a canopy of stars.

More

Nordic Fjord Journe

Guided by Norway’s midnight sun, our solar‑charged van traced emerald fjords, camped beside thundering waterfalls, and proved eco‑friendly travel thrives in rugged wilderness.

More
Read all Stories

Room Tours

Explore our van‑life site’s virtual room tours—quick, 360° walkthroughs of smart storage, comfy sleepers, compact kitchens, and eco‑upgrades—so you can picture your perfect mobile home before you travel.

This website is a project for the UOC (Open University of Catalunya) - it is aimed for educational purpose only. Designed and developed by Georg Jaenisch
